testcase.name: Configure Exception Call Out Costs to Contractor - "Standard"
testcase.system-out: Given a user with "Mercury_Admin_Core" role has logged in...................passed And "Admin" is selected from the Mercury navigation menu....................passed And the "Resources & Users" tile is selected................................passed And the user selects "Resources" from the sub menu..........................passed When an Active Contractor Resource is created...............................passed And the resource is edited..................................................passed And a "Standard" exception is added.........................................passed Then a new rate is added for Site with "Standard" type......................passed
